item.title: 特朗普的加密项目回击参议院小组调查
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的 "世界自由金融"（World Liberty Financial）加密货币项目的律师回击了参议院调查小组委员会民主党负责人提出的关于潜在利益冲突的指控。【原文：Attorneys for Donald Trump’s World Liberty Financial crypto project pushed back against claims about potential conflicts of interest raised by the Democratic head of a Senate investigative subcommittee.】

item.title: 关税影响盈利，Globant 日内跌幅创历史新高
item.description: 软件公司 Globant SA 将令人失望的第一季度业绩归咎于美国关税的连锁反应，盘中跌幅创下历史新高。【原文：Software company Globant SA suffered a record intraday decline after blaming its disappointing first-quarter results on the ripple effects of US tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普领导的美国证券交易委员会对首席执行官薪酬披露进行新一轮审查
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会将于下月召开圆桌会议，讨论高管薪酬披露规则，委员会主席保罗-阿特金斯（Paul Atkins）表示，这些规则已变得 "日益复杂和冗长"。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission will hold a roundtable next month to discuss executive compensation disclosure rules, which Chair Paul Atkins said have grown “increasingly complex and lengthy.”】

item.title: OpenAI 将帮助阿联酋开发世界上最大的数据中心之一
item.description: OpenAI 计划帮助在阿拉伯联合酋长国开发一个新的大型数据中心，该中心最终可能成为世界上最大的数据中心之一，这是对中东地区的一次重大投资，也是该公司全球人工智能基础设施雄心的一次重大扩展。【原文：OpenAI plans to help develop a massive new data center in the United Arab Emirates that may eventually be one of the largest in the world, a major bet on the Middle East and a significant expansion of the company’s global AI infrastructure ambitions.】

item.title: Cinven 为 60 亿欧元的 Ufinet 出售案与高盛和瑞银合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Cinven 已选择高盛集团和瑞银集团安排电信运营商 Ufinet 集团的出售事宜。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven has selected Goldman Sachs Group Inc. and UBS Group AG to arrange a sale of telecom operator Ufinet Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Marfrig 业绩飙升，BRF 收购计划被认为有利于买方
item.description: Marfrig Global Foods SA 对 BRF SA 提出收购要约后，公司业绩创下五年来最大涨幅，收购条件被分析师视为低廉，收购后公司规模将更大，可与世界顶级食品供应商相抗衡。【原文：Marfrig Global Foods SA surged the most in five years after making a takeover offer for BRF SA, creating a larger company to rival the world’s top food suppliers under terms that analysts saw as a bargain.】

item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的丽莎-沙利特（Lisa Shalett）表示，美国股市从上个月的暴跌深渊中猛烈反弹的势头即将停止。【原文：The furious comeback in US equities from the depths of last month’s rout is poised to come to a halt, according to Morgan Stanley’s Lisa Shalett.】

item.title: 德鲁肯米勒在阿根廷 ETF 创纪录反弹后谨慎下注
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者斯坦利-德鲁肯米勒（Stanley Druckenmiller）的投资公司减持了部分追踪阿根廷股票的交易所交易基金，而在此之前，该基金在今年年初曾一度涨至历史新高。【原文：Billionaire investor Stanley Druckenmiller’s investment firm cut some of its holdings in an exchange-traded fund tracking Argentina stocks, after a rally that took it to an all-time high at the start of this year.】

item.title: 能源交易商数十亿美元砸向金属市场，LME寻求遏制大额赌注
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所（London Metal Exchange）正在讨论对大额头寸实施限制，禁止最近几个月震撼市场的大额押注。【原文：The London Metal Exchange is discussing imposing curbs on big positions that would outlaw the sort of outsized bets that have rocked the markets in recent months.】

item.title: 莱恩称欧洲央行将在六月预测中纳入贸易情景
item.description: 欧洲央行首席经济学家菲利普-莱恩（Philip Lane）表示，欧洲央行将在下月发布季度展望报告的同时，公布更多的欧元区经济情景，以试图捕捉当前贸易动荡可能造成的影响。【原文：The European Central Bank will publish additional scenarios for the euro-zone economy alongside next month’s quarterly outlook in an attempt to capture the possible effects of the current trade turmoil, according to Chief Economist Philip Lane.】

item.title: 伯南克敦促美联储采用 "另类 "预测方案
item.description: 前美联储主席本-伯南克（Ben S. Bernanke）敦促美国央行向公众更全面地解释其利率决策，并对潜在的预测情景进行更丰富的研究。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Chair Ben S. Bernanke urged the US central bank to provide the public a fuller explanation of its interest-rate decisions and a much richer examination of potential forecast scenarios.】

item.title: 航运巨头达飞轮船公司（CMA CGM）在中国关税减免后货物量激增
item.description: 航运巨头达飞海运公司（CMA CGM SA）对中国的货运需求急剧上升，这进一步表明，在中国政府与美国就降低关税达成临时停战协议后，贸易正在反弹。【原文：Shipping giant CMA CGM SA is experiencing a sharp upswing in demand for freight transport out of China in a further signal that trade is rebounding after Beijing reached a temporary truce with the US to lower tariffs.】

item.title: MEG 能源控股公司抨击斯特拉思科纳公司 "可笑 "的收购要约
item.description: 一些 MEG Energy Corp. 股东表示，他们对竞争对手斯特拉思科纳资源有限公司（Strathcona Resources Ltd. ）的潜在收购要约不以为然。【原文：Some MEG Energy Corp. shareholders say they’re unimpressed with a potential takeover offer from rival oil producer Strathcona Resources Ltd.】

item.description: OpenAI 正在为 ChatGPT 用户推出一个新的人工智能代理，旨在帮助简化软件开发，因为该公司正在进入一个由初创公司和大型科技公司组成的拥挤市场，为程序员提供人工智能工具。【原文：OpenAI is rolling out a new artificial intelligence agent for ChatGPT users that’s designed to help streamline software development as the company pushes into a crowded market of startups and large tech firms offering AI tools for coders.】

item.title: 银行准备为 Flutter 意大利交易出售 25 亿欧元债券
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）是准备在下周发行约 25 亿欧元（约合 28 亿美元）高收益债券的贷款机构之一，为 Flutter Entertainment Plc 收购 Playtech Plc 的意大利博彩业务提供支持。【原文：Bank of America Corp. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are among lenders preparing to launch around €2.5 billion ($2.8 billion) of high-yield bonds next week, backing Flutter Entertainment Plc’s acquisition of Playtech Plc’s Italian gambling business.】

item.title: 拉托斯考虑北欧建筑公司森蒂亚（Sentia）IPO事宜
